longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a Travel Document issued to nationals of
  Mongolia.
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for nationals
of Mongolia.
Additional Information:
- A max. stay of 90 days is granted within one calendar year
  to nationals of Mongolia.
- All visitors are required to have health insurance which can
  be purchased on arrival in Minsk (MSQ)
